Lyrics: I syng of a mayden şat is makeles,
Poetic Translation: I sing of a maiden who mateless goes;

Lyrics: Kyng of alle kynges to here sone che ches.
Poetic Translation: The King of all Kings for his mother her chose.

Direct Translation: See Mike Pearson's work at LiederNet Archive.

Lyrics: He came also stylle şer his moder was
Poetic Translation: He came all so still where his mother passed,

Lyrics: As dew in aprylle, şat fallyt on şe gras.
Poetic Translation: As dew that in April falls down on the grass.

Lyrics: He cam also stylle to his moderes bowr
Poetic Translation: He came all so still to his mother's bower,

Lyrics: As dew in aprille, şat fallyt on şe flour.
Poetic Translation: As dew that in April falls down on the flower.

Lyrics: He cam also stylle şer his moder lay
Poetic Translation: He came all so still where his mother lay,

Lyrics: As dew in Aprille, şat fallyt on şe spray.
Poetic Translation: As dew that in April falls down on the spray.

Lyrics: Moder & mayden was neuer non but che --
Poetic Translation: For mother and maiden was none but she;

Lyrics: Wel may swych a lady Godes moder be.
Poetic Translation: Well may such a lady our God's mother be.
